title: Is She Cheating and Should I Leave
itunes:title: Is She Cheating and Should I Leave
description:
Hello Shirley Steve and Tommy let me start by saying that I have been married for six years without a problem. At least this is what I thought in parentheses. My wife and I along with her two children attended her best friend's wedding. I noticed that my wife introduced me to everyone but this one guy. But she did state that he used to work with her. As the wedding went on, I saw the guy whisper to my wife among friends.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

As the wedding went on, I saw the guy whisper to my wife among friends.
